thread.title: Arsenal fans told Alexis Sanchez will leave the club this summer during Emirates Stadium tour
thread.title_full: Arsenal fans told Alexis Sanchez will leave the club this summer during Emirates Stadium tour

author: sstreet
title: Arsenal fans told Alexis Sanchez will leave the club this summer during Emirates Stadium tour
text:
In-san-ity Arsenal fans told Alexis Sanchez will leave the club this summer during Emirates Stadium tour 
Young Gunners supporters were left distraught when they were told contract rebel Sanchez is set to depart Gossip Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments A GROUP of Arsenal fans were left stunned when they were told during a stadium tour that Alexis Sanchez will definitely leave the club this summer. 
The striker’s contract expires in 2018 and he is set to receive offers from China , Juventus and PSG . Getty Images 3 Alexis Sanchez will leave Arsenal in the summer, fans have been told on a stadium tour 
And according to The Times , staff at the Emirates astonishingly told the distraught young supporters that Sanchez will not be signing a new deal. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Ten thousand fans in the Chilean’s home country have already organised a march to convince him to leave Arsenal . 
Supporters from around the South American nation will join the ‘National March for Alexis Sanchez to leave Arsenal’ on March 1. Getty Images Staff at the Emirates Stadium left young supporters distraught when they announced the news Getty Images 3 Arsene Wenger hasn’t been able to convince the Chilean to sign a new deal 
The description on the Facebook page says: “We, as Chileans are tired to watch one of our biggest stars play on his own to make his team get through. 
“We don’t want him to play at Real Madrid , nor go back to Barcelona , we don’t give a f*** where he plays, we just want him to fight along with 10 other players to get the results. Alexis Sanchez scores Arsenal’s all important first goal against Hull with his hand 
“He doesn’t deserve to be alone.” 
But Sanchez insisted he is still focused on Arsenal , with a heartfelt Instagram message expressing his "dedication". A post shared by Alexis Sanchez (@alexis_officia1) on Feb 19, 2017 at 12:38pm PST 
In recent weeks, Gunners fans have stepped up their campaign to convince the Chilean to stay. 
During the home match against Burnley, a banner was on display at the Emirates dedicated to his dogs , Atom and Humber.
